overview: At the age of 73, Benjamin Netanyahu embarked on the 11th election campaign of his political career, which was also the fateful one of his life. With three charges pending against him in court, there was only one option for him: a landslide victory. Netanyahu went out into the field and brought himself to the voters in person on a transparent truck called the "Bibiba". The director, Itai Asher ("Dukotime"), closely follows this journey and documents a historic campaign, one that has hardly been covered by the media.
tagline: Benjamin Netanyahu in the most fateful campaign of his life
title: The Comeback
